ui

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Main

  • public class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    Main object is the runnable Object This object generate the main frame and paint all the subpanel This object handle the exception for unsolveable location input Use multiple thread to keep the main window from freezing when data is pulling
    Author:
    ca.uwo.csd.cs2212.team8

      • refresh

        public static void refresh(java.lang.String location,
                           int tempUnit)
        helper method to refresh main window according to the preference object it use multiple threads to keep the windows from being frozen
        Parameters:
        location - The location for the data to pull about
        tempUnit - unit for temperature

      • refreshUnit

        public static void refreshUnit(java.lang.String location,
                               int unit)
        method to refresh temperature unit
        Parameters:
        location - the location of data to pull about
        unit - the unit of temperature 0 - K, 1 - C, 2 - F

        public static boolean refreshed()
        method to test whether ther is at least an older data stored in Main frame
        Returns:
        true if there is no risk for null pointer exception; false, otherwise
